data.name: JEI Hover Search
data.summary: A simple and convenient Minecraft mod that allows you to quickly search for items in JEI by simply hovering over them and pressing a hotkey.

data.name: Recipe History Addon for JEI
data.summary: A plugin for JEI in 1.16.5 to add recipe history similar to JEI Utilities of 1.12.2

data.name: Jeildsaddons
data.summary: A mod thats addons for the jeildscraft severs all references from there

data.name: Ex Nihilo: Sequentia - JEI Addon
data.summary: Addon for Ex Nihilo: Sequentia to support JEI

data.name: JEIcats
data.summary: Adds JEI tabs for unknown recipes. Custom JEI tabs

data.name: [JEI] Armageddon Treasure Bags
data.summary: Adds JEI tab for Armageddon treasure bags

data.name: JEI Recipe Chains
data.summary: JEI Recipe Chains shows full recipe chains within JEI.

data.name: JEI Recipe History [Archived]
data.summary: Client side history of recent JEI recipe lookups
